components.name: AccountComponent
components.templateData: <app-profile></app-profile>

components.name: AccountListItemComponent
components.templateData:
<ng-container *ngIf="accountData">

  <app-row [h]="'space-between'"
           [v]="'center'" (click)="onClick.emit()"
           mat-ripple
           [style.height]="'65px'"
  ><app-row>

      <app-avatar [src]="accountData.avatar"
                  [jdentityValue]="accountData.id"
                  [style.margin-right]="'16px'"
      ></app-avatar>

      <app-column>

        <app-title [text]="accountData.name || (accountData.id | addressHidden)"
                   type="small"
        ></app-title>

        <app-address [address]="accountData.id"
                     [showCopyButton]="showCopyButton"
        ></app-address>

      </app-column>

    </app-row>

    <app-tokens [tokens]="accountData.balance"
                [style.margin-right]="'5px'"
    ></app-tokens>

  </app-row>

</ng-container>

components.name: AccountSidenavComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-sidenav-container>

  <mat-sidenav
    [mode]="'over'"
    [fixedInViewport]="true"
    fixedBottomGap="{{ (deviceService.isMobile$ | async) ? 50 : 0}}"
    fixedTopGap="{{ (deviceService.isMobile$ | async) ? 50 : 0}}"
    position="end">

    <app-column [margin]="'0 16px'" class="side-wp" *ngIf="myProfileData">

      <app-column [margin]="'16px 0 19px'" [v]="'start'">

        <app-close-button (onClose)="sideNavService.closeAccountSideNav()"
                          class="close-btn"
        ></app-close-button>

        <app-profile-info [profileName]="myProfileData.name"
                          [avatarSrc]="myProfileData.avatar"
                          [followersCount]="myProfileData.followersCount"
                          [followingCount]="myProfileData.followingCount"
                          [address]="myProfileData.address"
        ></app-profile-info>

        <app-row [v]="'center'" [margin]="'18px 0 0 0'">
          <app-address [size]="'medium'"
                       [showIcon]="true"
                       [iconMargin]="'0 25px 0 11px'"
                       [showCopyButton]="true"
                       [address]="myProfileData.address"
          ></app-address>

          <app-qr-button [style.margin-left]="'50px'"
                         [address]="myProfileData.address"
          ></app-qr-button>
        </app-row>

        <app-tokens [size]="'medium'"
                    [showIcon]="true"
                    [iconMargin]="'0 25px 0 11px'"
                    [style.margin-top]="'10px'"
                    [tokens]="accountService.balance$ | async">
        </app-tokens>
      </app-column>

      <mat-divider></mat-divider>

      <app-sidenav-menu [profileId]="myProfileData.address"></app-sidenav-menu>

      <mat-divider></mat-divider>

      <app-scroll>
        <app-account-list-item (onClick)="onChangeAccount(account)"
                                 *ngFor="let account of accounts"
                                 [accountData]="account"
        ></app-account-list-item>
      </app-scroll>


      <mat-divider  [style.margin-bottom]="'16px'"></mat-divider>

      <app-sign-out-button (click)="signOut()"></app-sign-out-button>

     </app-column>

  </mat-sidenav>

</mat-sidenav-container>

</ng-container>

components.name: FollowButtonComponent
components.templateData:
<ng-container *ngIf="isFollow; else following">

  <button
    (click)="onUnfollow.emit();"
    [ngClass]="width"
    [ngStyle]="{
      'font-size': size === 'medium' ? '14px': '17px',
      'letter-spacing': size === 'medium' ? '1.25px' : '0'
    }"
    mat-stroked-button
    color="primary"
  >
    Following
  </button>

</ng-container>

<ng-template #following>

  <button
    (click)="onFollow.emit()"
    [ngClass]="width"
    [ngStyle]="{
      'font-size': size === 'medium' ? '14px': '17px',
      'letter-spacing': size === 'medium' ? '1.25px' : '0'
    }"
    class="follow-button"
    mat-flat-button
    color="primary"
  >
    Follow
  </button>

</ng-template>

components.name: PostItemComponent
components.templateData:
<ng-container *ngIf="postItemData && !isHiddenPost">

  <mat-card [style.padding-bottom]="showActionPanel ? '4px' : '16px'">

    <app-hidden-content *ngIf="postItemData.hidden && postItemData.isMyPost" [type]="'post'"></app-hidden-content>

    <app-row [ngClass]="['post-main-wp']">

      <app-column class="w100">

        <app-row [v]="'start'"
                 [h]="'space-between'"
        >
          <app-post-info [userName]="postItemData.ownerName"
                         [spaceName]="postItemData.spaceName"
                         [imageUrl]="postItemData.ownerImageUrl"
                         [createdAtTime]="postItemData.createdAtTime"
                         [ownerId]="postItemData.ownerId"
                         [postLink]="postItemData.postLink"
                         [spaceLink]="postItemData.spaceLink"
          ></app-post-info>

          <app-option-button [type]="'post'"
                             [isContentHidden]="postItemData.hidden"
                             (onClickViewReaction)="onViewReaction()"
          ></app-option-button>

        </app-row>

        <app-embed-video [videoUrl]="postItemData.link"></app-embed-video>

        <app-title [text]="postItemData.title"
                   [link]="postItemData.postLink"
                   [style.margin-top]="'15px'"
        ></app-title>

        <app-paragraph [marginTop]="5"
                       [link]="postItemData.postLink"
                       [text]="postItemData.summary"
                       [isShowMore]="postItemData.isShowMore"
        ></app-paragraph>

      </app-column>

      <app-post-image [link]="postItemData.postLink"
                      [type]="(deviceService.isMobile$ | async) ? 'full' : 'square'"
                      [imageSrc]="postItemData.imageUrl"
      ></app-post-image>

    </app-row>

    <mat-divider *ngIf="showActionPanel"
                 [style.margin]="'12px 0 4px 0'"
                 [inset]="true"
    ></mat-divider>

    <app-action-panel [isShowComment]="true"
                      [upvoteCount]="postItemData.upvotesCount"
                      [downvoteCount]="postItemData.downvotesCount"
                      [commentCount]="postItemData.repliesCount"
                      [isUpvoteActive]="postItemData.upvoteActive"
                      [isDownvoteActive]="postItemData.downvoteActive"
                      [isShowShare]="true"
                      (commentClick)="onCommentButtonClick()"
                      *ngIf="showActionPanel"
    ></app-action-panel>

    <ng-container *ngIf="isCommentOpen">

      <mat-divider [inset]="true" [style.margin]="'4px 0 16px 0'"></mat-divider>

      <app-comments [commentListData]="commentData$ | async"></app-comments>

    </ng-container>

  </mat-card>

</ng-container>

components.name: SpaceComponent
components.templateData:
<app-space-profile [spaceItemData]="spaceData"
                   [isAutoExpandSummary]="isAutoExpandSummary"
                   class="space-wp"
></app-space-profile>

<ng-container *ngIf="postIds.length > 0; else noPost">

  <app-post-list [type]="'all'" [ids]="postIds"></app-post-list>

</ng-container>

<ng-template #noPost>

  <app-no-content [text]="'No posts yet'"></app-no-content>

</ng-template>

components.name: SpaceItemComponent
SpaceListComponent
SpaceProfileComponent
components.templateData:
<ng-container *ngIf="spaceItemData">

  <mat-card>

    <app-row [h]="'space-between'"
             [v]="'start'"
             [margin]="'0 0 10px 0'"
    >

      <app-space-info [spaceName]="spaceItemData.content.name"
                      [avatarSrc]="spaceItemData.content.image"
                      [followersCount]="spaceItemData.struct.followersCount"
                      [postsCount]="spaceItemData.struct.postsCount"
                      [link]="'@' + spaceItemData.content.handle"
                      [itemType]="'single'"
                      [spaceId]="spaceItemData.struct.id"
      ></app-space-info>

      <app-row [v]="'center'">

        <app-edit-button *ngIf="isOwner" [style.margin-right]="'16px'"></app-edit-button>
        <app-option-button [type]="'space'"></app-option-button>

      </app-row>

    </app-row>

    <app-paragraph *ngIf="!spaceItemData.content.isShowMore"
                   [text]="spaceItemData.content.summary"
    ></app-paragraph>

    <app-expand-paragraph *ngIf="spaceItemData.content.isShowMore"
                          [text]="spaceItemData.content.summary"
                          [expandedText]="spaceItemData.content.about"
                          [isMore]="!isAutoExpandSummary"
    ></app-expand-paragraph>

    <app-link-icons [links]="spaceItemData.content.links"
                    [style.margin]="'19px 0 14px'"
    ></app-link-icons>

    <app-tag *ngFor="let tag of spaceItemData.content.tags"
             [tagName]="tag"
    ></app-tag>

    <app-row [ngClass]="'buttons-wp'"
             [margin]="'16px 0 0 0'"
    >

      <app-write-post-button *ngIf="isOwner"
                             width="full"
      ></app-write-post-button>

      <app-send-tips-button *ngIf="!isOwner"
                            width="full"
      ></app-send-tips-button>

      <app-follow-button size="large"
                         width="full"
                         [isFollow]="false"
      ></app-follow-button>

    </app-row>

  </mat-card>

</ng-container>

components.name: TagInputComponent
components.templateData:
<mat-form-field class="w100 tags-wp" appearance="outline">
  <mat-label>Tags</mat-label>
  <mat-chip-list #tagList aria-label="Tag selection">
    <mat-chip
      *ngFor="let tag of tags"
      [removable]="true"
      (removed)="remove(tag)">
      {{tag}}
      <button matChipRemove>
        <mat-icon>cancel</mat-icon>
      </button>
    </mat-chip>
    <input
      placeholder="{{placeholder}}"
      #tagInput
      [matChipInputFor]="tagList"
      [formControl]="tagCtrl"
      [matChipInputSeparatorKeyCodes]="separatorKeysCodes"
      (matChipInputTokenEnd)="add($event)">
  </mat-chip-list>
</mat-form-field>

variables.name: getStateEntityFromArray
variables.defaultValue:
<T>(
  array: Array<AnySubsocialData>,
  type: 'struct' | 'content' = 'struct'
): StateEntity<T> => {
  const ids: string[] = [];
  const entities: Entity<any> = {};
  array.map((elem) => {
    const id: string | undefined =
      type === 'struct' ? elem.struct.id.toString() : elem.struct.contentId;
    if (id) {
      ids.push(id);
      entities[id] = elem[type];
    }
  });
  return { ids, entities };
}

variables.name: mapPostDataToPostListItem
variables.defaultValue:
(
  postStruct: SharedPostStruct,
  postContent: PostContent,
  spaceStruct: SpaceStruct | undefined,
  profileContent: ProfileContent | undefined,
  spaceContent: SpaceContentExtend | undefined,
  myAddress: string,
  myPostReaction?: MyPostReactionsStruct
): PostListItemData => {
  return {
    id: postStruct.id,
    ownerId: postStruct.ownerId,
    ownerImageUrl: profileContent?.avatar || '',
    spaceName: spaceContent?.name || '',
    title: postContent.title,
    summary: postContent.summary,
    imageUrl: postContent.image ? environment.ipfsUrl + postContent.image : '',
    createdAtTime: postStruct.createdAtTime,
    repliesCount: postStruct.repliesCount,
    hiddenRepliesCount: postStruct.hiddenRepliesCount,
    visibleRepliesCount: postStruct.visibleRepliesCount,
    sharesCount: postStruct.visibleRepliesCount,
    upvotesCount: postStruct.upvotesCount,
    downvotesCount: postStruct.downvotesCount,
    isSharedPost: postStruct.isSharedPost,
    isComment: postStruct.isComment,
    isShowMore: postContent.isShowMore,
    ownerName: profileContent?.name || '',
    postLink: spaceStruct?.handle
      ? getPostLink(
          spaceStruct!.handle,
          postContent.title
            ? postContent.title
            : postContent.summary.slice(0, 30),
          postStruct.id
        )
      : '',
    hidden: postStruct.hidden,
    isMyPost: postStruct.ownerId === myAddress,
    body: postContent.body,
    tags: postContent.tags,
    spaceId: postStruct.spaceId,
    link: postContent.link,
    sharedPostId: postStruct.sharedPostId,
    spaceLink: spaceStruct?.handle
      ? '/' + (spaceStruct.handle ? '@' + spaceStruct.handle : spaceStruct.id)
      : '',
    upvoteActive: myPostReaction?.kind === 'Upvote',
    downvoteActive: myPostReaction?.kind === 'Downvote',
  };
}

src/app/core/utils/utils.ts.name: getPostLink
getStateEntityFromArray
src/app/core/utils/utils.ts.defaultValue:
<T>(
  array: Array<AnySubsocialData>,
  type: 'struct' | 'content' = 'struct'
): StateEntity<T> => {
  const ids: string[] = [];
  const entities: Entity<any> = {};
  array.map((elem) => {
    const id: string | undefined =
      type === 'struct' ? elem.struct.id.toString() : elem.struct.contentId;
    if (id) {
      ids.push(id);
      entities[id] = elem[type];
    }
  });
  return { ids, entities };
}

src/app/core/mapper/post.map.ts.name: mapPostDataToPostListItem
src/app/core/mapper/post.map.ts.defaultValue:
(
  postStruct: SharedPostStruct,
  postContent: PostContent,
  spaceStruct: SpaceStruct | undefined,
  profileContent: ProfileContent | undefined,
  spaceContent: SpaceContentExtend | undefined,
  myAddress: string,
  myPostReaction?: MyPostReactionsStruct
): PostListItemData => {
  return {
    id: postStruct.id,
    ownerId: postStruct.ownerId,
    ownerImageUrl: profileContent?.avatar || '',
    spaceName: spaceContent?.name || '',
    title: postContent.title,
    summary: postContent.summary,
    imageUrl: postContent.image ? environment.ipfsUrl + postContent.image : '',
    createdAtTime: postStruct.createdAtTime,
    repliesCount: postStruct.repliesCount,
    hiddenRepliesCount: postStruct.hiddenRepliesCount,
    visibleRepliesCount: postStruct.visibleRepliesCount,
    sharesCount: postStruct.visibleRepliesCount,
    upvotesCount: postStruct.upvotesCount,
    downvotesCount: postStruct.downvotesCount,
    isSharedPost: postStruct.isSharedPost,
    isComment: postStruct.isComment,
    isShowMore: postContent.isShowMore,
    ownerName: profileContent?.name || '',
    postLink: spaceStruct?.handle
      ? getPostLink(
          spaceStruct!.handle,
          postContent.title
            ? postContent.title
            : postContent.summary.slice(0, 30),
          postStruct.id
        )
      : '',
    hidden: postStruct.hidden,
    isMyPost: postStruct.ownerId === myAddress,
    body: postContent.body,
    tags: postContent.tags,
    spaceId: postStruct.spaceId,
    link: postContent.link,
    sharedPostId: postStruct.sharedPostId,
    spaceLink: spaceStruct?.handle
      ? '/' + (spaceStruct.handle ? '@' + spaceStruct.handle : spaceStruct.id)
      : '',
    upvoteActive: myPostReaction?.kind === 'Upvote',
    downvoteActive: myPostReaction?.kind === 'Downvote',
  };
}
